name: Noodles, Coffee, Market, Historical place to start a morning
description: Like i said in my profile, Vietnamese traditional food needs to be tasted in a local place with local pricing, not in restaurant. You may have heard about famous Vietnamese traditional beef noodles "Pho". Luckily, i know the exact place for it. Me and my family go to this "Pho" selling place for over 15 years, it sells only in some hours in the morning and always crowded.
